readable.title: 3730011701_5352e02286
readable.content: A little girl buried in the sand . A little girls waist high in sand A little girl with a hat sits between a woman 's feet in the sand in front of a pair of colorful tents . The little girl in the yellow hat is buried up to her waist in the sand on the beach . The small baby in a yellow has the lower half of her body buried in sand .
